packages.basic-info:
Up to 2 hours shooting
Highlight video (3-5 min)
Online gallery delivery
packages.premium-info:
Up to 5 hours shooting
Highlight video (5-7 min)

packages.luxury-info:
Full day coverage
Highlight video (7-10 min)
Full film (40-60 min)
Drone shots included
Personalized box with USB

about.title: About Me
about.text1: I have over 10 years of experience in the industry. I love turning videos into unforgettable moments. My passion is to capture emotions and tell stories through the lens.
